Matt

----- Original Message -----
From: "Bob McCoy" <mccoy@...>
To: <nihonto@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 31, 2004 3:55 AM
Subject: RE: [nihonto] Yanone question


> The NTHK will paper Yanone but not the NBTHK, so there can't be
> A Juyo Yanone. I don't know the highest level that the NTHK will
> Give to a Yanone.
>
> Regards,
> Bob.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Matthew E. Hoyle [mailto:matthewhoyle@...]
> Sent: Sunday, May 30, 2004 3:36 PM
> To: token_kenkyu_kai@...
> Cc: nihonto@yahoogroups.com; nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [nihonto] Yanone question
>
>
> Hi gang, I was wondering if yanone are paperable, and if anyone has ever
> heard of a juyo yanone?
> Matt
